Function.Description: The associate function returns the first pair in a List of Pair whose car component matches the object argument.

Brief.Overview: The associate funtion returns the first pair in a List {list} of Pair whose car component matches the object argument {obj}. If no Pair in the target List has a car component matching the key, then false is returned. The target must be a List each of whose elements are Pairs.
Brief.Usage: When a Bit Vector has been evolved, using a genetic algorithm, as a genome, the bitToIntegerVector function is an efficient way to convert the Bit Vector genome into an Integer Vector for direct use in solving the target problem

Argument.Name: bitVector
Argument.Note: A Bit Vector to be converted into an Integer Vector

Argument.Name: intVector
Argument.Note: (Optional) an Integer Vector to receive the converted bits from the Bit Vector
